column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The careworn cleaner appears to be in a spot of bother.
Collect the True Vue refuse sacks.
Speak with the careworn cleaner.
Express your /doubt to the leering delinquent.
Hand over the True Vue refuse sacks to the careworn cleaner.
Oh, come to check up on me, have you? I appreciate your concern. As you can probably tell, I'm feeling a little out of sorts.
What will you say?
Shall I fetch a healer for you?
Do you need me to escort you somewhere?
Perhaps I could treat you?
Oh no, there's no need for that. I have a condition, you see─it makes me numb and lethargic from time to time. Nothing a little rest won't put right, though.
The trouble is, when I get like this, I'm in no state to work. I hate to presume, but would you be willing to lend a hand?

I'm one of the cleaners in charge of True Vue. I was then getting ready to collect the last of the refuse sacks and call it a day when my condition flared up... I'd be ever so grateful if you could finish my rounds for me.
Please, it's only a few refuse sacks. You'd be doing me a real kindness. I can barely feel my arms and legs...
Ohoho! You look damn near death! What's the matter!?
Huh? Whatever's ailin' ye got to your tongue has it!?
A-Ah, there you are... I, err...these fellows have─

Our ol' pal here's feeling under the weather─can't finish his work. So he offers to pay us─generously, I might add─to get the job done! In other words, ain't got no need for the likes o' you. Go on, piss off!

This is clearly nothing more than a brazen attempt at extortion. Turn the full force of your <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>doubt<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> on the leering delinquent.
Of all the days they could have picked...
Listen, we've got our ol' pal here covered! Do yerself a favor and walk away before this gets ugly.
Lemme get this straight, <Emphasis>you're</Emphasis> the one our ol' pal here asked to help? Hah! What a load o' shite!

H-Hold on a moment. This <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>feller</If> looks like <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she's<Else/>he's</If> seen a fair few scrapes... Wait, don't tell me they're a bloody hunter!
A hunter? Sod this for a lark! I'd rather keep me head!
Look, I just told you. <Emphasis>We're</Emphasis> dealin' with this feller's problems. If you know what's good for you, you'll turn around and keep walkin'.

This is clearly nothing more than a brazen attempt at extortion. Turn the full force of your <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>doubt<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> on the leering delinquent.
Phew... I dread to think what would've happened if you hadn't showed up. Ah, am I right to assume you've finished collecting the refuse sacks for me?
Excellent, I'll take care of these. I must say─refuse collection, civic protection...you're a <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> of many talents. You have my gratitude.
This sector isn't exactly the safest in the city... Shakedowns and racketeering are unfortunately rather commonplace.
Usually, I try to leave as soon as I finish my rounds, but today my luck ran out and I had one of my turns.

This condition─it's caused by sensitivity to lightning energy. I hear the worst affected are all but bedbound by paralysis, so perhaps I should count myself lucky that my symptoms are relatively mild.
But enough about that. Thanks to you, I feel more or less back to my usual self. To think that I'd run into someone as virtuous as you on True Vue.
